Title: Magnetic stripe reader with energy management management for attachment to a PDA gadget
Abstract: A magnetic stripe card manual swipe reader (MSR) unit capable of attaching to and communicating which has a traditional private digital assistant (PDA) from a range of makers, implementing only the electrical electrical power attainable as supplied from the PDA gadget, and capable of powerful electrical energy management and conservation operations.
